name: Cemex S.A.B. de C.V.
description: Cemex S.A.B. de C.V. is a global leader in the building materials industry, specializing in the production and distribution of cement, ready-mix concrete, and aggregates. Founded in 1906 in Monterrey, Mexico, Cemex has grown to establish a significant presence in over 50 countries, making it one of the largest construction material companies in the world. The company is dedicated to providing innovative and sustainable solutions for its customers, which include contractors, builders, and architects. Cemex's commitment to sustainability is evident in its efforts to reduce carbon emissions and improve energy efficiency in its production processes. The company has invested heavily in research and development to create high-performance products that meet the evolving needs of the construction industry while minimizing environmental impact. Notable product offerings include its Eco-Crete, which incorporates recycled materials, and its range of cement products designed for various applications. Cemex also emphasizes digital transformation in its operations, leveraging technology to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency. With a strong focus on corporate social responsibility, Cemex actively engages in initiatives that support community development and environmental stewardship. The company's vision is to build a better future by providing the materials that build the world.
